overview: Sports & Fitness, Basketball - This feel-good documentary chronicles the first 25 years of the Kevin Bushell Pre Teen Basketball Classic, an annual summer event founded by a U.S. postal worker, designed to give the youngest residents of Brooklyn's Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood their very own basketball league. Interviews with a few of the program's most notable success stories feature Stephon Marbury of the New York Knicks and Jamaal Tinsley of the Indiana Pacers.
title: 25 Strong: Film About Basketball
